title: Ritualist Dedication
desc: You have begun to master the difficult art of casting rituals.

title: Able Ritualist
desc: Your readings on rituals make you a skilled participant.

title: Ritual Researcher
desc: Careful research into the art of rituals has made you better at performing them.

title: Experienced Harrower
desc: When you perform the harrowing ritual, the DC for the Primary Check is never more than the standard DC by level, and the cost for the ritual is halved.

primary_dc.explainer: You are the primary caster, and performing the Harrowing ritual.

title: Thaumaturgic Ritualist
desc: Your studies into the supernatural have resulted in an especially strong knowledge of rituals.

title: Macabre Virtuoso
desc: Any necromancer can create zombie and skeleton, but you know the secrets behind the creation of far more advanced undead monstrosities.

primary_circumstance.name: primary_circumstance
primary_circumstance.explainer: You are the primary caster, and you are casting a Create Undead ritual.

title: Skeleton Commander
desc: You gain the ability to summon your own skeletal minions.

primary_circumstance.explainer: You are the primary caster, and casting Create Undead for a skeletal undead.

title: Avatar's Audience
desc: Your extensive service has made you a lesser herald of your deity, which affords you certain privileges.

primary_value.name: primary_value
primary_value.explainer: You are the primary caster, and are casting Avatar's Audience.

secondary_circumstance.name: secondary_circumstance
secondary_circumstance.explainer: You are the secondary caster, and helping someone who is casting Avatar's Audience.
